example[0]: He was completely frank with her about what happened.
example[1]: She was quite frank about the whole thing.
definition[1]: to print a sign on an envelope showing that the cost of sending it has been paid
definition[3]: to print a sign on an envelope or package to show that the cost of sending it has been paid
example[2]: All mail for despatch should be franked.
example[3]: If the volume of mail is high, afranking machine can save time.
